lead_paragraph: The Homeland Security Department has failed to meet even half its performance expectations in the four years it has been in existence, Congressional auditors have concluded.

headline.main: Security Dept. Falls Short of Goals, Auditors Report
headline.print_headline: Security Dept. Falls Short Of Goals, Auditors Report

snippet: The Homeland Security Department has failed to meet even half its performance expectations in the four years it has been in existence, Congressional auditors have concluded.
